acidity.notes: Tart berry or plum. Cold navy blue. Almost exclusively a sweet fruit juice on cooldown.

sweetness.notes: There's some complexity here. Sweetness makes the acidity like a cranberry juice â€” sharp and focused, but delightful. At one point in the sip the sweetness becomes more complex and juicy.

finish.notes: Some lingering warmth in mouth. Tea-like.

flavor: Even better than yesterday. Fruit note is less overwhelming and finish is longer.
actionItem: Try to replicate this recipe again.
